content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, about the rental price, I'm sure we can find a mutually beneficial amount. Let's start with €1,000 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a pretty high price, Mister Schmidt. I am a student, so I have to be careful with my money. I am willing to pay €500 per month, because I saw a similar apartment for this price in a different location. I could also sign a two-year contract to show my commitment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €500 per month is far below my expectations. Considering the prime location of my apartment, I'm sure you'll agree that it's worth more than an apartment in a different location. However, I appreciate your willingness to sign a two-year contract. Let's meet in the middle, shall we? I'll reduce the price to €800 per month. It's a fair deal for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your counter-offer, Mister Schmidt. I can pay €700 per month and I am willing to pay a deposit of one month's rent. I believe this is a fair price for me as a student.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, your offer of €700 per month and a deposit of one month's rent is not satisfactory for me. Considering the prime location of my apartment, the fair price should be €800 per month. However, I appreciate your commitment and willingness to pay a deposit. Let's find a middle ground. I'll reduce the price to €750 per month. This is the lowest I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my position, Mister Schmidt. I accept your offer of €750 per month. I agree to the price of 750 Euro!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [750] Euro! Congratulations, Emilia. I hope you enjoy your stay in my apartment. Let's proceed with the necessary paperwork for the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful, Mister Schmidt. I am looking forward to moving into your apartment. I want to discuss one more thing. Can you provide me with a furniture package for an additional fee? I don't have any furniture yet.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm glad you asked. I don't have any furniture, but I can help you with that. I know a reliable furniture company that can provide a full furniture package for an additional €800. However, I must inform you that this transaction would be separate from the rent agreement for the apartment. Let me know if you're interested.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your help, Mister Schmidt. I will consider your offer for the furniture package. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation for the rental price. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we already agreed on a price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand, Emilia. Since we have already agreed on the rental price, I will wait for your decision regarding the furniture package. Please let me know if you need any assistance with the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I have decided to accept your offer for the furniture package. I agree to the price of 800 Euro for the furniture package.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [800] Euro for the furniture package. Congratulations, Emilia. You've made a wise decision for both the apartment and the furniture package. I will proceed with the lease agreement and the furniture company will contact you shortly. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I look forward to moving into the apartment and working with the furniture company. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we terminate the negotiation?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for asking, Emilia. Since we have agreed on the rental price and the furniture package, there is nothing left to discuss for the lease agreement. I will proceed with the paperwork for both the apartment and the furniture package. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
